Sentencas: This work presents a thermodynamic analysis of the integration of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with chemical looping combustion (CLC) in natural gas power plants.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: The fundamental idea of the proposed process integration is to use a dual fluidized-bed CLC process to complete the oxidation of the H-2-CO-rich anode exhausts from the SOFC in the CLC fuel reactor while preheating the air stream to the cathode inlet temperature in the CLC air reactor.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: Thus, fuel oxidation can be completed in N-2-free environment without the high energy and economic costs associated to O-2 production, avoiding at the same time the high temperature and high cost heat exchanger needed in conventional SOFC plants for air preheating.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: In the proposed configurations, the CLC plant is operated at mild conditions (atmospheric pressure and temperature in the range of 700-800 degrees C), already demonstrated in several pilot plants.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: Two different scenarios have been investigated: in the first one, the SOFC is designed for large-scale power generation (100 MWLHV of heat input), featuring a heat recovery steam cycle and CO2 capture for subsequent storage.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: In the second scenario, the system is designed for a small-scale plant, producing 145 kg/h of pure CO2 for industrial utilization, as a possible early market application.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: The main parameters affecting the plant performance, i.e. SOFC voltage (V) and S/C ratio at SOFC inlet, have been varied in a sensitivity analysis.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: Three different materials (Ni, Fe and Cu-based) are also compared as oxygen carriers (OCs) in the CLC unit.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: The integrated plant shows very high electric efficiency, exceeding 66%(LHV) at both small and large scale with a carbon capture ratio (CCR) of nearly 100%.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: It was found that, except for the cell voltage, the other operating parameters do not affect significantly the efficiency of the plant.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production

Sentencas: Compared to the benchmark SOFC-based hybrid cycles using conventional CO2 capture technologies, the SOFC-CLC power plant showed an electric efficiency similar to 2 percentage points higher, without requiring high temperature heat exchangers and with a simplified process configuration.
Titulo: Integration of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and chemical looping combustion (CLC) for ultra-high efficiency power generation and CO2 production
